name: juvenile sourdough starter
description: This jar contains a floury paste that is slowly going bad.  Someday it will be sourdough.

use_action.msg: After feeding it and caring for it for weeks, your sourdough starter is finally ready for the big leagues.
use_action.not_ready_msg: You've been caring for your starter for a while, but it's going to need longer before you can do anything tasty with it.

name: sourdough starter
description: This jar contains precious mix of flour, water, and molds and bacteria from the air. When you add flour and water to it, after a few hours it froths and rises.

name: sourdough bread
description: Healthy and filling, with a sharper taste and thicker crust than yeast-only bread.
